distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from hmp_menu_channel
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update hmp_menu_channel
sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
back_img = #{backImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hide = #{hide,jdbcType=BIT},
menu_img = #{menuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_cn = #{nameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

sub_menu_type = #{subMenuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pages_id = #{pagesId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_property = #{isProperty,jdbcType=CHAR},

creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update hmp_menu_channel set sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, back_img = #{backImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hide = #{hide,jdbcType=BIT}, menu_img = #{menuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_cn = #{nameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_type = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_menu_type = #{subMenuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hotel_id = #{hotelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pages_id = #{pagesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_property = #{isProperty,jdbcType=CHAR}, property_ype = #{propertyYpe,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, breed_id = #{breedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select hmc.*,pages.content_cn,pages.content_en,pages.img,pages.back_img as QRCodeImg from hmp_menu_channel hmc left join sys_menu_pages pages on hmc.id = pages.menu_id where parent_id = #{parentId} and hotel_id = #{hotelId} order by hmc.order_num
